version_description:
New cars!
New photo mode
Fix duel errors
Corrected painting of the chrome elements of the car
Synchronization issues fixed

New cars!
New photo mode
Fix duel errors
Corrected painting of the chrome elements of the car
Synchronization issues fixed

New cars!
New photo mode
Fix duel errors
Corrected painting of the chrome elements of the car
Synchronization issues fixed

New cars!
New photo mode
Fix duel errors
Corrected painting of the chrome elements of the car
Synchronization issues fixed

New cars!
New photo mode
Fix duel errors
Corrected painting of the chrome elements of the car
Synchronization issues fixed

- New cars
 - Changed the view of the multiplier
 - Removed loss due to strikes
 - Cars do not fall from the sky (almost)
 - Added manual gearbox
 - Added; it is possible to change the size and location of any of the control buttons
 - Added Adjustment of sensitivity and severity of control buttons
 - Added analog control buttons
 - Added time counter after exiting pause
 - Fixed problems with charging money for racing / double deduction for tuning (because of this, the players went to minus)
 - Added drive icons in the drive selection menu
 - Fixed a problem with photos of cars in the garage (no photo)
 - Fixed "disappearance" of messages in a small chat
 - Fixed the appearance of the machine in another machine (free mode)
 - Added money deduction when starting a duel. Be careful!
And fixed more minor bugs.

New duel completion screen
Facebook login removed from the game. In order not to lose your account, use the e-mail.
If you have any problems with the entrance, we will be happy to help! Use the "I have a problem" button

P.S. I am preparing a major update in the next version. Follow the news!
